text: Yithi (Muhammad): “Mna koko kutyhilwe kum andifumani nto ingavumelekanga ukuba ityiwe ngulowo ufuna ukuyitya ngaphandle kwento ezifele ngokwayo, okanye etsawuliswe igazi nenyama yehagu kuba ezo ziyinqambi, ziziinyama ezingahlambulukanga, ezixhelelwe ukuba ngamadini ayiminikelo yathixo bambi ngaphandle koAllâh. Kodwa ke lowo unyanzeliswe yimeko kungengakuzithandela kwakhe engaqhutywa lugabadelo; Inene iNkosi yakho nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
